name: Minimum Security Prison
description:
Play as the Surveillance supervisor in a  prison complex!

Press the button below the monitors to alert the guards of escaping convicts.
See if you have what it takes to reach the 6th level!

WebGL is a bit buggy. I have been trying to fix why the game is getting cropped but to no success. Pressing the fullscreen button can work around this issue. Please download the desktop build if you encounter problems.

Game created as a part of CIIT Syntax's Link Up Game Jam with the theme of "Shift".

Audio:
Sound effects were taken from freesound.org
Background music by Heatley Bros

www.youtube.com/c/HeatleyBros
